WorkItem.Description:
The template returned by the DataTemplateSelector is not actually used by the TreeViewEx, although the DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate is still called. If I set manually an ItemTemplate, it works. The problem seems to be related to the use of a DataTemplateSelector.

I'm attaching a sample project with the 3 following cases:
 - a TreeViewEx with a DataTemplateSelector, __not working__
 - a TreeViewEx with a single "green" ItemTemplate, working
 - a TreeView (the default control from Microsoft) using a DataTemplateSelector, working
